LanguageData.Fox_Fennec.label: 사막 여우
LanguageData.Fox_Fennec.description: A small 여우 originally from the northern part of Earth's Africa continent. It hunts small creatures and has very large ears.
LanguageData.Fox_Red.label: 붉은 여우
LanguageData.Fox_Red.description: A small solitary canine evolved for hunting small prey in temperate climates.
LanguageData.Fox_Arctic.label: 북극 여우
LanguageData.Fox_Arctic.description: A small predator adapted for the far north. It usually hunts small game like mice and voles, sometimes burrowing through a meter of snow to reach its prey.
